title: Week 17 preview
itunes:title: Week 17 preview
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling and Gregg Rosenthal – go game-by-game previewing each Week 17 matchup, including all the games that have playoff implications for a few NFC teams still hanging on to postseason hopes. Plus, “Around the NFL” Chicago correspondent Kevin Patra joins the show to talk a little trash with Chris Wesseling who is currently tied with Patra at the top of the ATN weekly picks race.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
